sentences.en: I hope this book is not yet another restatement of the prevailing wisdom.
sentences.cn: 我希望这本书不会又是重复一些流行的至理名言。

sentences.en: Overusing restatement , which can be distracting to the interviewee.
sentences.cn: 过多重述回答将使被访谈者分心.

sentences.en: Present a clarification or restatement of the problem, as appropriate.
sentences.cn: 需适当的简化或重申问题.

sentences.en: Restatement Clarification of the Problem - state in your own words what you are going to do.
sentences.cn: 再次重述问题 — 用你自己的话重述你将要解决的问题.

sentences.en: Restatement: All things are known by their attributes.
sentences.cn: 潜台词: 事物的分类由自身的特征所决定.

sentences.en: Restatement: pretense and adversity are inversely proportional; adversity reveals the true nature of all things.
sentences.cn: 潜台词: 伪装和逆境成反比, 逆境可以揭露一切事物的本质.

sentences.en: Restatement: Those who soar with the eagles can not swim with the ducks.
sentences.cn: 潜台词: 能和鹰在空中翱翔的,不能和鸭子一起游泳.

sentences.en: The article concluded with a restatement of the major points presented.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章结尾再次重申了它的主旨.

sentences.en: Thus, fault plays a role in the Restatement assessment.
sentences.cn: 所以, 在重审估价中,缺陷也起着一定作用.

sentences.en: Your essay appears to be a restatement of the essay prompt with few additional details.
sentences.cn: 你的作文象是作文写作提示的重述,缺少另外的细节.

trans.tran_en: A restatement of something that has been said or written is another statement that repeats it, usually in a slightly different form
